se.nicklasgavelin.sphero
Class Robot.RobotRawMovement

java.lang.Object
  se.nicklasgavelin.sphero.Robot.RobotRawMovement
Enclosing class:
Robot
public class Robot.RobotRawMovement
extends java.lang.Object

Raw movement values for the robot. These have no connection to the ordinary robot movement RobotMovement as these use direct commends to the engines instead of pre-defined commands.

Author:
Nicklas Gavelin
